ygData.subject: Re: Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: You can find them in stores because people sell them there alot. With a high chr you can get over a plat for them, and selling them to players you don t get
ygData.messageBody:
You can find them in stores because people sell them there alot. With a
high chr you can get over a plat for them, and selling them to players
you don't get much more. Plus when you have 6 of them it's just easier.
The problem here is they re-sell from the shops at around 36plat.

Bashlor the Barb warrior of Bertox


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kelly Pruett [SMTP:pruett@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 3:11 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Armor
>
> From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
>
> Are you sure they she sells them. I've never been able to buy them
> (don't need
> to anyway) and when I sell items, she is one of my favorites because
> my selling
> price to her tends to be higher. I would be intrested to find out SHE
> actually
> sold them. If so I would have bought one looooongg ago instead of
> fighting the
> gnoll commander for mine. Or was that the gnoll elites ... don't
> remember. One
> of the two of them had it spawn occasionally. But mine was only like
> AC+3 and
> STR+2(or +3 .... damn I can't remember crap today). I will check
> later. I would
> be glad to steer new warriors to her shop if she sells them though.
>
> -Faderic
>

>
